document_notes.text:
This update for glibc fixes the following issues:

Security issues fixed:

- CVE-2017-12133: Avoid use-after-free read access in clntudp_call (bsc#1081556)

Non security issue fixed:

- Fix incorrect getaddrinfo assertion trigger (bsc#1076871)
document_notes.title: Details

notes.text: Use-after-free vulnerability in the clntudp_call function in sunrpc/clnt_udp.c in the GNU C Library (aka glibc or libc6) before 2.26 allows remote attackers to have unspecified impact via vectors related to error path.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description
